title: Enterprise asset process - Business rules
content:
The enterprise asset workflow relies on a few simple business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field affected by a business rule during that phase.

All processes

In the out-of-the-box enterprise asset workflow, the rules detailed for each of the following events apply to all processes.
